cause.description:
Graydon wrought off his 1987 Porsche 944S, and with out it he is having problems picking up the ladies. He would like to buy a BMW or a Jaguar but funds are short any contributions would be greatly appreciated.
1. Graydon misses he car and is looking for something to fill the void.
cause.mission: To help raise mony so Graydon to buy a new car
cause.name: Graydon's new car foundation
